verbs.description: [ARG1: Workers] [V: failed] [ARG2: in their duties and responsibilities] [ARGM-LOC: at a Philadelphia senior care facility where Herbert R. McMaster Sr ( pictured ) , the dad of Donald Trump 's former national security adviser died after a fall] .
